THE NOBLE QURAN Read, study, and learn The Noble Quran.
This website serves as a continuous charity. Our aim is to make it simple for all to read, understand, and study the Noble Quran. The Noble Quran is also known by many names, including Al-Quran Al-Kareem, Al-Kitab, Al-Furqan, Al-Maw'itha, Al-Dhikr, and Al-Noor.
